name: Crocodile Dentist 3D Free
description:
3D Crocodile Dentist!!!
The First 3D Crocodile Dentist game on IOS platform.

3D Crocodile Dentist is a virtual remade classic game. Crocodile Dentist is an exciting game that you can have so much fun to play and bet with your friends. "3D Crocodile Dentist" let you experience a whole new nostalgic classic game.

Game Features:
360 degree view. Multi-touch for zooming in and zooming out.
Different roles are unlockable after challenges.
3D makes it more real to pull crocodile's teeth out!

Do you still remember the Crocodile Dentist which was a very popular game that you used to play when you were a child? Now, 3D Crocodile Dentist is available on IOS!

Crocodile Dentist is a very fun game which can show one's lucky, suitable for playing it with friends and family.

The moment of crocodile's bite is the most exciting part of the game. And there are various crocodile roles waiting for players to unlock.

Come on~ Take the cool crocodiles to enjoy pulling out the teeth with your friends together.
